name: riblet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of meat from the end of an animal's rib (= one of the curved bones of the chest): I baked the riblets in a casserole dish. Coat the riblets in oil and herbs before you cook them.
More examplesFewer examplesHe came into the dining room carrying a tray of barbecued lamb riblets.I picked up a pack of pork riblets from my local butcher.Trim the fat off your riblets before they go onto the barbecue.I ordered some riblets with fries.
